SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
Les Flammes du brandon infligent 3 blessures réparties de la manière que vous choisissez entre une, deux ou trois cibles, créatures et/ou joueurs.
Las Llamas de la instigadora hacen 3 puntos de daño divididos como elijas entre una, dos o tres criaturas y/o jugadores objetivo.
Flammen des Hitzkopfs fügt 3 Schadenspunkte zu, deren Aufteilung auf ein, zwei oder drei Ziele deiner Wahl, die Kreaturen und/oder Spieler sein können, du bestimmst.
Le Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente infliggono 3 danni suddivisi a tua scelta tra una, due o tre creature e/o giocatori bersaglio.
クリーチャーやプレイヤーを、望む組み合わせで３つまで対象とする。烙印の炎はそれらに、３点のダメージを好きなように分割して与える。
플레이어 및/또는 생물을 대상으로 목표를 최대 세 개까지 정한다. 선동가의 불길은 그 목표들에게 피해 3점을 당신이 나눈 대로 입힌다.
Пламя Разжигательницы наносит 3 повреждения, разделенные по вашему выбору между одним, двумя или тремя целевыми существами и (или) игроками.
Chamas da Instigadora causa 3 pontos de dano distribuídos à sua escolha entre uma, duas ou três criaturas e/ou jogadores alvo.
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_CARDS + FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetEquivalenceDepth(3)
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local i=0 while MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(i) ~= nil do local target_chest = MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(i) local target_card = target_chest:Get_CardPtr(0) local target_player = target_chest:Get_PlayerPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil or target_player ~= nil then local damage_to_deal = 1 local j = i+1 while MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j) ~= nil do
if target_card ~= nil then if target_card == MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Get_CardPtr(0) then damage_to_deal = damage_to_deal+1 MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Set_CardPtr(0, nil) end elseif target_player ~= nil then if target_player == MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Get_PlayerPtr(0) then damage_to_deal = damage_to_deal+1 MTG():EffectDataChest():Get_Targets(j):Set_PlayerPtr(0, nil) end end
j=j+1 end
local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end
if target_card ~= nil then target_card:DealDamage( damage_to_deal, source ) elseif target_player ~= nil then target_player:DealDamage( damage_to_deal, source ) end end i=i+1 end
